text: @SomeBitchIKnow .Studies indicate that the #coronavirus #COVID2019 can live on most surfaces for as long as 9 days. Including; cell phones, door knobs, shopping carts, desks, keyboards, pens. Pretty much everything you touch! Whereas the flu virus typically survives 24-48 hours. #WashYourHands
